content.question: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.Write an essay that:Has a relevant thesis.Addresses all parts of the question.Supports thesis with specific evidence.Is well organized.Contrast the impact of nationalism in Germany and the Austrian Empire from 1848 to 1914.

frqParts.text: Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.Write an essay that:Has a relevant thesis.Addresses all parts of the question.Supports thesis with specific evidence.Is well organized.Contrast the impact of nationalism in Germany and the Austrian Empire from 1848 to 1914.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
